Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: -15
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Fluid Defense: +5 Armor Class
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Two-Handed Wield Damage Adjustment: +1
Weapon Finesse: +1 light melee weapon attack (Dexterity instead of Strength)
Weapon Focus (Falchion): +1 Falchion Attack Modifier
Weapon Focus (Greatsword): +1 Greatsword Attack Modifier
Weapon Specialization (Falchion): +2 Falchion Damage Modifier
Weapon Specialization (Greatsword): +2 Greatsword Damage Modifier
Blade Dance: May use Canny Strike, Clever Fighting, Weapon Defense, and Well-Aimed Strike feats with falchion and greatsword
Blind-Fight: May reroll miss due to concealment/Invisible foe gains no melee bonus/Suffers half penalty for impaired vision
Canny Strike: Inflicts +3d4 HP w/finesse weapon
Clever Fighting: Inflicts +1 HP w/finesse weapon
Combat Expertise: May suffer up to -5 attack to gain equal AC bonus
Crashing Waves: May use Disarm or Trap as AOO 4/rd
Improved Grapple: Grapple provokes no AOO/+4 Grapple check
Improved Unarmed Strike: Unarmed attack provokes no AOO and may deal lethal damage
Improvised Weapon: Suffers no penalty w/improvised weapons and a -2 attack penalty for non-proficient weapons
Natural Horseman: +1 melee damage on horseback/Suffers half ranged penalty on horseback
Power Attack: May suffer up to -15 attack for equal damage bonus
Quick: +1 attack w/light weapons
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dexterity modifier to AC
What Was Will Be Again: Gains x2 attacks and 3 5' steps in a full-round action 1/day
Save: Fortitude: +10; Reflex: +12; Will: +4
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: -1
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +3
Quick: +1 Reflex
Endurance: +4 extended physical action
Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Magic
Spells:
Blur (Shadow Walker2 Illu): Foes attacking touched have 20% miss chance for 15 min
Displacement (Shadow Walker3 Illu): Foes attacking touched suffer 50% miss chance for 15 rd
